duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform HVAC Control systems programming, troubleshooting, installation, commissioning, and preventative maintenance related to mechanical, electrical, and low voltage controls components.
Respond to service and warranty calls using Johnson Controls configuration and commissioning tools, as well as electrical testing meters and other electronic testing equipment.
Provide front-line technical and repair support through effective communications with Johnson Controls customers, and propose system repair and update recommendations.
Assist in proposing recommendations to Johnson Controls customers, and document changes and provide information for as-built documentation.
Load Johnson Controls controller software, perform commissioning, system diagnostics, calibration, and complete all required commissioning documentation.

Keep management and customers informed of job progress and issues, engage with customers to fully understand their systems and needs, communicate upon arrival and before leaving the work site, and attend required safety training.

education_certification.credential: 2-4 years of experience with BAS, Honeywell, Siemens, Tridium, Trane, Automated, etc.
Strong understanding of HVAC systems, sequences, and applications
Demonstrated technical aptitude in mechanical and electro-mechanical fields
Ability to use hand, power tools, and electrical testing equipment such as a multimeter
Solid knowledge base in the use of personal computers
Attention to detail and good communication and listening skills.
